channel.title: News on The Sacramento Massage Therapist - Paul Brown, CMT
channel.description: Recent content in News on The Sacramento Massage Therapist - Paul Brown, CMT

item.title: Pulled Up Short, aka Ctrl-Alt-Del
item.description:
So back on 17 January 2024, I was walking along a sidewalk and I was struck by an F-150 pickup truck. I was briefly knocked unconscious and blah, blah, blah, sustained some injuries and damage to my electronics. Whatever right?

Well, not really. Although I survived, and I will get the necessary care I need to heal as much as I can, the experience compelled to do some frank and cogent examination of the state of affairs of my bodywork practice, and more importantly, my attitude toward “tending the garden,” as it were.

item.title: Fathers Day Gift Idea
item.description:
Dad deserves a massage!

Massage Therapy is a Perfect Gift

Dad Deserves a massage!

With Father’s Day just around the corner, you should pick up a massage gift card from Paul Brown Massage Therapy, that’s me!

Why Massage for Fathers Day?

A massage eGift card from Paul Brown CMT makes a great gift:

item.title: The Two Hour Massage Returns
item.description: I have had a number of clients ask me for a return to that two hour session length, and I had held off on saying yes, but then I met The Mountain: a literal giant of a man; at 6’8” and 340 solid pounds, he makes me feel small, and I’m 6’5” and 285! Ninety minutes sessions simply weren’t long enough to meet his bodywork needs, so I figured what the heck, I can offer a limited number of longer sessions each week. Thus, the two hour massage returns!

item.title: Myofascial Therapy Price Increase
item.description:
Effective immediately, I have increased the price of my myofascial therapy massage sessions to $150 per hour.

The change reflects the specialized nature of the work, as well as additional techniques I have picked up at the physical therapy clinic I work on Tuesdays.

Book a Myofascial Therapy Massage Today
